Scattershot:

Scattershot looked to DevilDuer.  "Hold on, I'm picking something up on my 
internal scanners." after walking a few minutes, he rounded a corner of the 
small crashed ship.  Raising his rifle at Ultra Optimus, he looked him up and 
down.  "Hmmm...good enough to join I suppose.  Puny though.  "Alright, state 
who you are!  We are from the Alliance!  The strongest faction on the planet. 
 Do you wish to join us?"
